name: The Game of Life: SpongeBob SquarePants Edition
summary: The Game of Life just got wetter! Dive into a whole new world of "The Game of Life" with SpongeBob SquarePants. Become a Fry Cook at the Krusty Krab, adopt a Giant Clam as a pet, or even get stung by a jellyfish. Maybe you'll get named "Champion Bubble Blower", become Plankton's friend for the day, and win a year's supply of Krabby Patties. Once you reach the Shady Shoal's Rest Home, count your clams. The player with the most clams wins.
info:
